name: Magical Adventure (itch)
description:
Magical Adventure

A magical forest contains all sort of possibility  A girl is willing to start on her adventure to find all the coins that are most valuable and also have the power for fulfilling one’s wish. The magic bottles in the forest will lead the way to the coins in each level, after collect five coins, the wish of the girl will come true. 

As in a magical forest, all the gameplay will surround the theme, magical. All objects are build into the look of containing magics. The forest is floating above water.  The floating magic bottles with mysterious light on. The floating coins attracting people. Mysterious boxes sometime appears on the way of journey. 

The player acts as the girl who is on her adventure, finding the coins and wanting to live in a magical house that hidden in the sky, which no one would reach. The girl would encounter obstacles like fire, and have to run over dangerous platforms that could easily make you fall. 

You will have the control of the jumping mechanics by pressing the spacebar for making the character to jump over to the next platform. You get to determined the progress of the gameplay, whether the character is fall or touch the fire or get the coin. 

Help her to get away from danger! Help her to find her dream home! Credits:
